DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the precision of an unobtrusive sleep measurement system. The system measures a force sensor signal under the mattress and analyzes sleep quality. The system measures: time in bed, sleep stages, sleep fragmentation, heart rate, respiration rate, sleep related breathing disorders, and limb movements.
DOC.brief_title: Validation Study for an Unobtrusive Online Sleep Measurement System
